All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bluetooth
Represents a Bluetooth wireless communication device.
BME280
Represents a BME280 temperature sensor device.
Device
Abstract base class for all hardware devices in the system.
Device.State
Represents the operational state of a device.
DHT11
Represents a DHT11 temperature sensor device.
Display
Abstract class for display devices in the system.
GY951
Represents a GY951 IMU (Inertial Measurement Unit) sensor device.
HWSystem
Central controller class that manages all hardware operations and protocols.
I2C
Implementation of the I2C communication protocol.
IMUSensor
Abstract base class for IMU (Inertial Measurement Unit) sensor devices.
LCD
Represents an LCD display device in the system.
Main
Entry point of the embedded hardware system simulator.
MotorDriver
Abstract class for motor driver devices in the system.
MPU6050
Represents an MPU6050 IMU (Inertial Measurement Unit) sensor device.
OLED
Represents an OLED display device in the system.
OneWire
Implementation of the OneWire communication protocol.
PCA9685
Represents the PCA9685 motor driver device.
Port
Represents a hardware port in the system.
Protocol
Defines a communication protocol interface for hardware devices.
Sensor
Abstract base class for all sensor devices.
SparkFunMD
Represents the SparkFunMD motor driver device.
SPI
Implementation of the SPI communication protocol.
TempSensor
Abstract base class for temperature sensor devices.
UART
Implementation of the UART communication protocol.
Wifi
Represents a Wifi communication device.
WirellesIO
Abstract base class for all wireless communication devices.
